en.today: Take stock of your mood upon awakening, dearest Aries, as an early morning square between the Cancer moon and Venus rx could throw you off balance. Luckily, you'll recover emotionally when Mars activates this evening, putting you in a passionate and nurturing headspace. Know your social limits as midnight draws close and Luna aspects Chiron and Saturn, urging you to embrace the sweet serenity only solitude can provide before creeping under the covers.

en.today: The Cancer moon and Venus Rx, your planetary ruler, form a harsh square in the very early hours. Pause and sit with your feelings upon awakening, beloved bull, sending grace to any people or situations that have upset you recently. Your spark returns with increased brilliance when Luna aspects the sun and Mars this evening, putting you in the mood to be seen. Do something adventurous with friends, and consider exploring uncharted territory in your area. Give yourself plenty of time to rest up as the night comes to a close and the moon connects with Chiron and Saturn.
